name: Privy Tycoon
description:
Build some Joe's. Joe's need to eat. And than need to shit in the privacy of some privy. Build privies to earn money, so you could buy more Joes, more food stands and more privies. To earn more money. If you want - you can also buy toilet mints for some real cash:)

Game made during Nordic Game Jam 2014

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wXwIwrYTutI
